reviewText: ALL OFF THE STORIES ARE SO TOUCHING WITH DIFFERENT STARS. WESLEY SNIPES STORY GOT TO ME SO MUCH. "THE BOY WHO PAINTED JESUS BLACK" IS VERY WARMING TO MY HEART. I BOUGHT THE DVD BECAUSE WESLEY SNIPES IS IN IT. THE STORY EXPRESSES HOW CHILDREN HAVE THEIR INNOCENT MINDS AND THEY DO THINK AND BELIEVE THAT ANYTHING IS POSSIBLE. I ENJOYED ALL OF THE CHILDREN IN IT. THE WHOLE DVD STORIES ARE SOME REAL LIFE THINGS AND WILL HOLD YOUR ATTENTION AND CAPTIVATE YOUR HEART. I LOVE IT AND WILL WATCH IT OVER AND OVER AS I HAVE ALL OF WESLEY SNIPES MOVIES. I LOVE HIM.
summary: GREAT DVD WITH WESLEY SNIPES AND DANNY GLOVER
Title: America's Dream

reviewText: HBO showed this and i was hoping they would release it on DVD but when i started looking for iti couldn't find it but somethng told me to check amazon and there it was America's DreamI was so glad to have purchase this Program has good stories  :-)
summary: I looked For This Movie Couldn't Find it
Title: America's Dream

reviewText: There was some really good acting and the movie kept me interested.  The characters were believable and I liked this movie overall.
Title: America's Dream

reviewText: I liked this triology. 3 stories that tell the truth about years ago and blacks enduring discrimmination.
Title: America's Dream

reviewText: AMERICA'S DREAM is interesting especially the story adapted fromHistorian John Henrik Clarke's The Boy Who Painted Christ Black.John Henrik Clarke was one of the historian advisers and friend of Malcolm X.A MUST SEE!
Title: America's Dream
